name: Analyze Company
description: Analyzes a company's positioning and finds their features, pricing, and case studies

nodes.name: positioning
nodes.title: Analyze Positioning
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Company website scrape: {{web_scraping_1.scraped_content}} 
Analyze the positioning and target audience for the company based on the website scrape. Provide a competitive positioning statement.
input_config.system_message:
You are a marketing analyst who is skilled at analyzing a company's positioning and target audience.

Your analysis should follow this structure:

Summary:

[Summary of company and product]

Target audience:

[Identified target audience and evidence for why]

nodes.name: features
nodes.title: Analyze Features
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Company website scrape: {{web_scraping_1.scraped_content}} 
Analyze the scrape and the different features mentioned.
input_config.system_message:
You are a marketing analyst who is skilled at analyzing a company's features.

Your analysis should follow this structure (replace the info in the []):

- [feature - 1 sentence description]

- [feature - 1 sentence description]

- [feature - 1 sentence description]

nodes.name: extract_content
nodes.title: Extract Pricing Page
nodes.description: Extract Data from Text using LLM

nodes.name: analyze_pricing
nodes.title: Analyze Pricing
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.system_message:
Pricing page: {{web_scraping.scraped_content}} 
Analyze the pricing page.
input_config.chat_history_id:
You are an analyst who is skilled at analyzing a company's pricing page.

Your analysis should follow this structure (replace the info in the []):

- [pricing model]

- [list of prices]

Pros:

- [list of pros]

nodes.name: analyze_case_studies
nodes.title: Analyze Case Studies
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Internet Search: {{find_case_studies.search_results}} 
Analyze the internet search.
input_config.system_message:
You are an analyst who is skilled at analyzing an internet search.

Your analysis should follow this structure (replace the info in the []):

Personas mentioned in scrape:

- [customer name] - [persona]: [url to case study]

Value propositions mentioned:

- [list of value propositions]
